citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 6:00p on
11-APR-19.
Went to house and kennel location, called phone and licensee stated they were out of town.
